name: eth-layer2-lone
description: A Layer 2 Ethereum blockchain network with Optimistic rollup architecture

scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:sequencer && npm run build:sdk
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:sequencer && npm run test:sdk
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network goerli
scripts.clean: npm run clean:contracts && npm run clean:build
scripts.install:all: cd contracts && npm install && cd ../sequencer && npm install && cd ../verifier && npm install && cd ../sdk && npm install && cd ../bridge && npm install

author: Layer 2 Development Team
